alert.note: Alert for Okaloosa Coastal; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 2:35PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL OKALOOSA AND EAST CENTRAL SANTA ROSA COUNTIES THROUGH 230 PM CDT... At 135 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles south of Laurel Hill to 3 miles southwest of Crestview to 3 miles east of Bagdad. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crestview, Niceville, and Valparaiso. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for northwestern Florida.

area.areaDesc: Okaloosa Coastal; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland
